content:
From: Tjark Weber <tjark.weber@it.uu.se>
Uppsala University, Sweden, advertises a tenure-track position as
assistant professor in Computing Science. A candidate should have a PhD
in computer science with research merits in one of the following areas:
design and implementation of programming languages, especially with
respect to parallelism and concurrency, handling of large data volumes,
including information extraction, combinatorial optimisation, formal
methods and computer science didactics. Teaching duties will include
Software Engineering. Closing date for applications is August 15, 2019.
A link to the full ad and instructions on how to apply can be found
here:

http://www.uu.se/en/about-uu/join-us/details/?positionId=276759

När du har kontakt med oss på Uppsala universitet med e-post så innebär det att vi behandlar dina personuppgifter. För att läsa mer om hur vi gör det kan du läsa här: http://www.uu.se/om-uu/dataskydd-personuppgifter/

E-mailing Uppsala University means that we will process your personal data. For more information on how this is performed, please read here: http://www.uu.se/en/about-uu/data-protection-policy
